verses.roman:
kṛṣṇera sahāya, guru, bāndhava, preyasī
gopikā hayena priyā śiṣyā, sakhī dāsī

synonyms: kṛṣṇera—of Lord Kṛṣṇa; sahāya—helpers; guru—teachers; bāndhava—friends; preyasī—wives; gopikā—the gopīs; hayena—are; priyā—dear; śiṣyā—students; sakhī—confidantes; dāsī—servants.
translation: The gopīs are the helpers, teachers, friends, wives, dear disciples, confidantes and serving maids of Lord Kṛṣṇa.
